## Initial setup

Publish the project to Quarto Pub interactively by typing

```sh
export QUARTO_PUB_AUTH_TOKEN=TOKEN_HERE
quarto publish
```

Save the generated `_publish.yml`. Once the `_publish.yml` is generated, the succeeding builds will be handled by GitHub actions.

## Wiki

This website contains resources related to the R [@Lib-R-Manual-2023] package [rProject](https://github.com/ijapesigan/rProject) outside the [pkgdown](https://ijapesigan.github.io/rProject) documentation.
